lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to sleep on the porch, do you want me to sleep on the balcony maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I don't want to-- That's not safe! Maybe I could, oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just put a hammock on the balcony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is Caduceus following us upstairs? (laughter) Caduceus, we're being sneaky!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you're talking loud enough for me to hear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said they're trying to be sneaky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We said we were very sleepy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to have a talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no privacy in this house! Stupid group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, maybe just for a couple hours, if she doesn't show up, we'll see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want to take the balcony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll sleep on the balcony.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're behind a wall, right? We're gated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a wall, no, and there's maybe a small fence, but it's pretty open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If anybody comes up, you know, we had a fight or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I just passed out outside because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's going to run recon? She's not coming up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, are there glasses in this place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you go up, Nott, I thought all the ladies left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not drinking tea, are you drinking tea?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, hold that, I really wanted some tea, you know, just in time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course!" Goes ahead and pulls a few glasses out and fills them for everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want some boy time, that's fine, me and Yeza can go downstairs and start cleaning up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I've got all sorts of things "to make sure I've triple-packed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I pass by the front, where he is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeza can stay if he wants to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to stay or not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think everybody can stay who wants to stay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have something to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm getting a drink, I just need to settle my nerves before tomorrow because we're jumping a very far distance and I'm still getting the hang of this and there's a lot going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want everybody to be on the same page.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys aren't leaving me, are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if you all want us to drink--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sit with me while I have a drink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to get drunk, I'm going to have a shot and calm my nerves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't had a sip yet, Caduceus, I just-- Have you tried this yet or have you only had tea? You only drank tea, haven't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I drink other things, but my brief experimentation with spirits has not gone well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to kill us all in our sleep tonight? (laughter) Oh my gosh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys finish your drinks, some tea, some tea plus, heading to your respective chambers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for you, you're staying on the stoop, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And keeping an eye out for Dairon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might occasionally peak around the back, fervently looking for her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you up on the roof of the balcony or just your balcony?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the balcony, the one that's a shared balcony.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go, I want to be under the tree a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit out in front of the tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll stay for an hour writing in the other book and I'll turn in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you all scatter to your respective positions for the evening's rest, keeping watch, looking out, Beau and Jester, make perception checks for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, from the balcony standpoint, glance off the side and you see a figure leap, and hands very quietly touch the edge of the balcony railing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was going up the balcony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The balcony rail where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize it as the drow image of Dairon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she's downstairs on the stoop, literally right below you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshing) Leaps up, very silently does a cartwheel flip over the side before landing on the tips of her toes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come inside, have a nice cup of tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fetch her, we have much to discuss." She stomps ever so quietly into the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No wait, what? No! Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see the way she asked for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to throw it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven dollars and never seen again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was an emotional recovery episode of the past few weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it had some elements of recovery, some elements of continuous tension rising and puckering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What rises and puckers? Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, hope you guys have a wonderful week, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
